title: Mind Your Business or Intervene
itunes:title: Mind Your Business or Intervene
description:
Tuesday 5/30- Today on the show we let our listeners blast their ex during our segment the "Ex Files" and after a front page story broke about a fatal stabbing of two men after defending a woman, we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners would do in that situation. Also, Charlamagne gave Donkey of the Day to Giants Owner John Mara.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
